DOC.brief_title: Wound Treatment With 3 % Sodium Pentaborate Pentahydrate
DOC.detailed_description: Chronic foot wound difficult treat common especially diabetic peripheral arterial venous insufficiency patient . For reason prepared hydrogel formulation . Gel preparation : Hydrogel formulation prepare disperse 1 % ( w/v ) carbopol polymer ( Carbopol Ultrez-21 , Lubrizol , USA ) distil water . Neutralization buffer ( 1.6g 1M sodium hydroxide solution 1L polymer-water suspension ) use gelation polymer . Sodium pentaborate pentahydrate ( 3 % w/v ) , F68 ( 2 % w/v ) F127 ( 2 % w/v ) mix blank hydrogel store 4 Â°C completely dissolve ( approximately 24 h ) . pH hydrogel formulation set 6.5-7.0 use 1M sodium hydroxide . The hydrogel without active ingredient use negative control ( vehicle ) . For first group wind dress apply hydrogel 3 % Sodium pentaborate pentahydrate , control group wind dress apply hydrogel without active ingredient everyday two month . The doctor observe take photo wound every week outpatient clinic .
